Others: The Red Sox lost to the Chicago White Sox 7-2 on September 8, 2024.
Zack Kelly allowed five runs in the top of the ninth inning, resulting in the loss.
Richard Fitts made his MLB debut for the Red Sox and pitched into the sixth inning.
The Red Sox went 0 for 6 with runners in scoring position.
The loss left the Red Sox four games back in the AL Wild Card race.
